abstract: Mile Mrksic, a Serbian former army official sentenced to 20 years in prison by a United Nations tribunal for his role in the torture and death of over 200 people in Croatia during 1991 Balkan Wars, dies at age 68.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Mrksic was serving a 20-year prison sentence for his part in the 1991 killings and torture of more than 200 people during the Balkan wars.

headline.main: Mile Mrksic, a Serb Army Officer Convicted of War Crimes, Dies at 68

snippet: Mr. Mrksic was serving a 20-year prison sentence for his part in the 1991 killings and torture of more than 200 people during the Balkan wars.

keywords.value: War Crimes, Genocide and Crimes Against Humanity
keywords.name: subject
